product_name: Pieps Tour Rider 24 JetForce Avalanche Airbag Pack
long_description: The right size for anything from 1-and-done laps to a full day of backcountry skiing, the Pieps Tour Rider 24 JetForce Pack carries your essentials and features a fan-inflated airbag for added safety.
short_description: The right size for anything from 1-and-done laps to a full day of backcountry skiing, the Pieps Tour Rider 24 JetForce Pack carries your essentials and features a fan-inflated airbag for added safety.
